statements: SELECT material_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE material_type = 'Metal' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_name FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 100 AND supplier_contact LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT DISTINCT material_type, supplier_name FROM inventory_management ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM inventory_management WHERE material_type = 'Metal' AND supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity < 50 AND (material_type = 'Plastic' OR supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001') ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, quantity DESC;

SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, COUNT(material_type) AS total_materials FROM inventory_management GROUP BY supplier_id, supplier_name HAVING COUNT(material_type) > 1 ORDER BY total_materials DESC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT material_name, quantity * price AS total_price FROM materials WHERE price > 10
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM tools WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY material_name
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM tools WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY tool_name;
SELECT material_name, quantity, price FROM materials WHERE quantity > 10 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100;
SELECT tool_name, available FROM tools WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY available DESC, tool_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tools WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type FROM tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM tools WHERE quantity > 0 AND tool_type = 'Power Tool';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT material_id, name FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM materials WHERE quantity < 50 AND price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM materials JOIN orders ON materials.material_id = orders.material_id ORDER BY price ASC, name ASC;
SELECT suppliers.name, SUM(orders.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers INNER JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.name HAVING total_quantity > 500;

SELECT materials.name, inventory.location, inventory.quantity FROM materials LEFT JOIN inventory ON materials.material_id = inventory.material_id WHERE materials.quantity > 0 AND inventory.quantity <= 50;

SELECT suppliers.name AS supplier_name, COUNT(orders.order_id) AS order_count FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.name ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM materials ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tool_name, quantity_in_stock FROM tools WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT material_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM materials WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_price FROM materials WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_cost FROM orders WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT tools.tool_id, tools.tool_name, tools.quantity_in_stock, suppliers.supplier_name FROM tools JOIN suppliers ON tools.tool_id = suppliers.supplier_id
